posts.post_title: FS: T206 Dolly Gray PSA 6 No Longer Available!
posts.post_content:
Offering this great PSA 6 Dolly Gray with beautiful eye appeal and great color, Sweet Cap 350/30 back. Asking $265 delivered. Paypal F/F or Chase Bank Quickpay. I will always consider respectable offers. Thanks.
